name: Casino Heist (itch)
description:
NOTE: Recommended to be played with Google Chrome or the offline version from the download section below (both support controller, better audio).

Casino Heist is an infinite runner mixed with casino slots. Run, get coins, spin the slots and win rewards or get some game-changing goodies!

PLOT TWIST!

Your bag has a hole (must be a glitch!), so you are constantly losing money! If your money reaches 0, you go bankrupt! You are also being chased by the security team because you stole $1000 from the casino vault!

So, how long can you keep running?

Created for gbjam-5 (160 x 144 res, 4 colors).

Casino Heist OST: https://soundcloud.com/wertandrew2/casino-heist-ost
